item.title: Mapo Tofu Recipe
item.author: ljq258@gmail.com (White World)
item.description: Ingredients 500g fresh tofu 150g minced (scalped) beef 50g green onions Seasonings 120g cooking oil 5.5g salt 20 ml Mapo tofu sauce (soy sauce) chili powder (to taste) 20g Pixian bean paste 250g double-boiled soup (made from bone with ginger and pepper) 40g starch and water (the starchy sauce) (2g chicken powder) Directions Preparation Dice the tofu into 2 cm (½–1”) cubes, and put them into a bowl of hot water to remove astringency.
